text: I have an issue with my form on my HubSpot Webpage. When I click on a control box it disappears. What can help to fix this?
Thatâ€™s strange. Do you have a target set for the form in the parameters?
Wondering if I could pick someone's brain about using Vue.js in HubSpot
literally just trying to get a hello world to work for right now.
No console errors, but also, no message
You need a {% raw %} and {% endraw %} around your #app element :wink: HS doesn't know the difference between JS Handlebars and Jinja Handlebars
if you need to feed any vars via hubl to your app, my method is to include a script tag on the page  with those vars, then set some data vars in your vue app to those js vars

My usual workflow if I do need to use anything serverside is use HubL to populate the data object, then use raw filters around the HTML just to ensure that markup isn't messed with. While I love Vue to bits, it can be a little confusing and messy incorporating render logic into the HTML, especially on HS.
I had a feeling it was the curly braces
no prob, welcome to the small HS vue club
Your t-shirt is in the mail.

Thanks!  I think I've got a pretty good use case.  I was hanging out with some friends of mine who attended/spoke at a Vue conference here last week and was asking myself why I haven't done anything with it yet
Yea, every time I have to do something that involves a fair amount of state or could involve cool animations I lean towards Vue
